text: Progressive osseous heteroplasia is a cutaneous condition characterized by cutaneous or subcutaneous ossification. According to the Progressive Osseous Heteroplasia Association: It is associated with GNAS. == See also == * Punctate porokeratosis * List of cutaneous conditions * Pseudopseudohypoparathyroidism == References == == External links == Category:Genodermatoses
title: Progressive osseous heteroplasia
